content: Yes, getting feedback from film festivals can be very helpful for filmmakers, especially those who are just starting their careers or trying to break into the industry. Feedback can provide the filmmakers with valuable insights into the selection process, as well as how to improve their filmmaking skills and storytelling techniques. It can also help them to tailor their submissions to future festivals, increasing their chances of getting selected. Overall, the feedback process is a great way for filmmakers to learn, grow, and refine their craft, which can ultimately lead to more success in the highly competitive world of filmmaking.
